name: The Return of the Pink Panther
summary_text: Inspector Jacque Clouseau (Peter Sellers) is put on the case when the Pink Panther diamond is stolen, with the Phantom's trademark glove the only clue.

name: Farewell My Concubine
summary_text: Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and will endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.

name: The Grifters
summary_text: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend, both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

name: Bleed for This
summary_text: The inspirational story of World Champion Boxer Vinny Pazienza who, after a near fatal car crash which left him not knowing if he'd ever walk again, made one of sport's most incredible comebacks.

name: Snow Dogs
summary_text: When a Miami dentist inherits a team of sled dogs, he's got to learn the trade or lose his pack to a crusty mountain man.

name: The Perfect Host
summary_text: An on-the-run convict looking for temporary cover finds it at the house of a very colorful character.

name: Destination Wedding
summary_text: The story of two miserable and unpleasant wedding guests, Lindsay and Frank, who develop a mutual affection despite themselves.

name: Incident in a Ghostland
summary_text: A mother of two who inherits a house is confronted with murderous intruders on the first night in their new home and fights for her daughters' lives. Sixteen years later when the daughters reunite at the house, things get really strange.

name: Heartbreaker
summary_text: Alex and his sister run a business designed to break up relationships. They are hired by a rich man to break up the wedding of his daughter. The only problem is that they only have one week to do so.

name: Screamers
summary_text: A military commander stationed off planet during an interplanetary war travels through the devastated landscape to negotiate a peace treaty, but discovers that the primitive robots they built to kill enemy combatants have gained sentience.

name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
summary_text: A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.

name: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
summary_text: Dora, a teenage explorer, leads her friends on an adventure to save her parents and solve the mystery behind a lost city of gold.

name: The Warrior's Way
summary_text: A warrior-assassin is forced to hide in a small town in the American Badlands after refusing a mission.

name: D3: The Mighty Ducks
summary_text: The unruly team of hockey misfits grows up a bit and receives scholarships to a prestigious prep school, where they take on the snotty varsity team.

name: The Disappearance of Alice Creed
summary_text: A rich man's daughter is held captive in an abandoned apartment by two former convicts who abducted her and hold her ransom in exchange for her father's money.

name: Strictly Ballroom
summary_text: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

name: Waking Ned Devine
summary_text: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

name: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
summary_text: Using a special camera that can see spirits, a family must protect their daughter from an evil entity with a sinister plan.

name: Firefox
summary_text: A pilot is sent into the Soviet Union on a mission to steal a prototype jet fighter that can be partially controlled by a neuralink.

name: Frontier(s)
summary_text: A gang of young thieves flee Paris during the violent aftermath of a political election, only to hole up at an Inn run by neo-Nazis.

name: Bright Star
summary_text: The three-year romance between 19th-century poet John Keats and Fanny Brawne near the end of his life.

name: Point of No Return
summary_text: A government fakes the death of a criminal to turn this young woman into a killer on its service.

name: The Relic
summary_text: A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like god, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.

name: Fire with Fire
summary_text: A fireman takes an unexpected course of action when a man whom he's been ordered to testify against, after being held up at a local convenience store, threatens him.

name: Barb Wire
summary_text: During the Second American Civil War in 2017, Barb Wire owns a nightclub called the Hammerhead. Things become complicated when her ex-lover Axel Hood, who is married to the fugitive Corrina Devonshire, re-enters her life.

name: The Toxic Avenger
summary_text: Tromaville has a monstrous new hero. The Toxic Avenger is born when meek mop boy Melvin falls into a vat of toxic waste. Now evildoers will have a lot to lose.

name: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
summary_text: Two overly imaginative pranksters named George and Harold hypnotize their principal into thinking he's a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

name: Wildlife
summary_text: A teenage boy must deal with his mother's complicated response after his father temporarily abandons them to take a menial and dangerous job.

name: Nobody Knows
summary_text: In a small Tokyo apartment, twelve-year-old Akira must care for his younger siblings after their mother leaves them and shows no sign of returning.

name: The Happytime Murders
summary_text: When the puppet cast of a '90s children's TV show begin to get murdered one by one, a disgraced LAPD detective-turned-private eye puppet takes on the case.

name: A Walk in the Woods
summary_text: After spending two decades in England, Bill Bryson (Robert Redford) returns to the U.S., where he decides the best way to connect with his homeland is to hike the Appalachian Trail with one of his oldest friends, Stephen Katz (Nick Nolte).

name: The Little Death
summary_text: The secret lives of five suburban couples living in Sydney reveal both the fetishes and the repercussions that come with sharing them.

name: A Love Song for Bobby Long
summary_text: A headstrong young woman returns to New Orleans after the death of her estranged mother.

name: Spring
summary_text: A young man in a personal tailspin flees from US to Italy, where he sparks up a romance with a woman harboring a dark, primordial secret.

name: Goodbye Christopher Robin
summary_text: The relationship between writer AA Milne and his son, Christopher Robin, and how this became the inspiration for Winnie the Pooh.

name: Django
summary_text: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a half-breed prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.

name: Knight of Cups
summary_text: A writer indulging in all that Los Angeles and Las Vegas has to offer undertakes a search for love and self via a series of adventures with six different women.

name: Ice Princess
summary_text: With the help of her coach, her mom, and the boy who drives the Zamboni machine, nothing can stop Casey (Trachtenberg) from realizing her dream to be a champion figure skater.

name: Baby Geniuses
summary_text: Scientists hold super intelligent talking babies captive, but things take a turn for the worse when a mix-up occurs between a baby genius and its twin.

name: Cross of Iron
summary_text: German commander Hauptmann Stransky (Maximilian Schell) places a squad in extreme danger after Sergeant Rolf Steiner (James Coburn) refuses to lie for him.

name: How to Steal a Million
summary_text: The daughter of an art forger teams up with a burglar to steal one of her father's forgeries and protect his secret.

name: DuckTales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
summary_text: Scrooge McDuck takes Huey, Dewey, and Louie to Egypt to find a pyramid and magic lamp.

name: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
summary_text: The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.

name: Autumn in New York
summary_text: Romantic drama about an aging playboy who falls for a sweet, but terminally ill, young woman.

name: Enthiran
summary_text: A brilliant scientist creates a humanoid robot to protect mankind, but things go awry when human emotions are programmed and inner turmoil causes the robot to switch sides.

name: The Informer
summary_text: An ex-convict working undercover intentionally gets himself incarcerated again in order to infiltrate the mob at a maximum security prison.

name: Gaslight
summary_text: Years after her aunt was murdered in her home, a young woman moves back into the house with her new husband. However, he has a secret that he will do anything to protect, even if it means driving his wife insane.

name: New Police Story
summary_text: A hero cop accidentally leads his team into a trap from which he is the only survivor. Drowning his guilt in booze, he is eventually assigned a new younger partner who turns out to have his own secrets.

name: Black Christmas
summary_text: On Christmas Eve, an escaped maniac returns to his childhood home, which is now a sorority house, and begins to murder the sorority sisters one by one.

name: Jason and the Argonauts
summary_text: The legendary Greek hero leads a team of intrepid adventurers in a perilous quest for the legendary Golden Fleece.

name: The Sacrifice
summary_text: At the dawn of World War III, a man searches for a way to restore peace to the world and finds he must give something in return.

name: The Assassination of Richard Nixon
summary_text: Based on real life events, Assassination is set in 1974 and centers on a businessman who decides to take extreme measures to achieve his American dream.

name: Major League II
summary_text: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

name: Around the World in 80 Days
summary_text: A Victorian Englishman bets that with the new steamships and railways he can circumnavigate the globe in eighty days.

name: The World According to Garp
summary_text: A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.

name: Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down!
summary_text: An unbalanced but alluring former mental patient takes a porn star prisoner in the hopes of convincing her to marry him.

name: Midnight Sun
summary_text: A 17-year-old girl suffers from a condition that prevents her from being out in the sunlight.

name: The Bounty
summary_text: Fed up with their Captain's harsh discipline, a sailing ship's crew decides to take action.

name: Eye See You
summary_text: A lead detective being stalked by a serial killer is asked to check into a clinic treating law enforcement officials who can't face their jobs.

name: In Order of Disappearance
summary_text: After his son is murdered by drug dealers, a snowplow driver starts seeking revenge.

name: One Night in Miami...
summary_text: A fictional account of one incredible night where icons Muhammad Ali, Malcolm X, Sam Cooke, and Jim Brown gathered discussing their roles in the Civil Rights Movement and cultural upheaval of the 60s.

name: The Truth About Cats & Dogs
summary_text: A successful veternarian & radio show host with low self-esteem asks her model friend to impersonate her when a handsome man wants to see her.

name: Vanishing on 7th Street
summary_text: The population of Detroit has almost completely disappeared, but a few remain. As daylight disappears they realize that the Dark is coming for them.

name: Return to Oz
summary_text: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

name: My Stepmother Is an Alien
summary_text: A creature from another planet tries to seduce a shy Earth physicist to gain control over his researches. The result of this important mission much exceeded her expectations.

name: A Guide to Recognizing Your Saints
summary_text: The movie is a coming-of-age drama about a boy growing up in Astoria, New York during the 1980s. As his friends end up dead, on drugs, or in prison. He comes to believe he has been saved from their fates by various so-called saints.

name: Torn Curtain
summary_text: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to find the solution for a formula resin before planning an escape back to the West.

name: What Men Want
summary_text: A woman is boxed out by the male sports agents in her profession, but gains an unexpected edge over them when she develops the ability to hear men's thoughts.

name: Speak
summary_text: After a blurred trauma over the summer, Melinda enters high school a selective mute. Struggling with school, friends, and family, she tells the dark tale of her experiences, and why she has chosen not to speak.

name: Operation Brothers
summary_text: Israel's Mossad agents attempt to rescue Ethiopian Jewish refugees in Sudan in 1979.

name: Parental Guidance
summary_text: Artie and Diane agree to look after their three grandkids when their type-A helicopter parents need to leave town for work. Problems arise when the kids' 21st-century behavior collides with Artie and Diane's old-school methods.

name: The Man
summary_text: Special Agent Derrick Vann is a man out to get the man who killed his partner, but a case of mistaken identity leads him to Andy Fiddler, a salesman with too many questions and a knack of getting in Vann's way.

name: Play It Again, Sam
summary_text: A neurotic film critic obsessed with the movie Casablanca (1942) attempts to get over his wife leaving him by dating again with the help of a married couple and his illusory idol, Humphrey Bogart.

name: Shark Night
summary_text: A weekend at a lake house in the Louisiana Gulf turns into a nightmare for seven vacationers as they are subjected to shark attacks.

name: Godsend
summary_text: A couple agree to have their deceased son cloned, under the supervision of an enigmatic doctor, but bizarre things start to happen several years after his rebirth.

name: Under the Shadow
summary_text: As a mother and daughter struggle to cope with the terrors of the post-revolution, war-torn Tehran of the 1980s, a mysterious evil begins to haunt their home.

name: The Big Boss
summary_text: A young man sworn to an oath of non-violence works with his cousins in an ice factory where they mysteriously begin to disappear.

name: Hope Floats
summary_text: Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her and a charming young man, who her daughter disapproves of, comes back into her life.

name: Take the Lead
summary_text: The real story of a dance teacher who believed in the talent of a group of problem kids.

name: Bulworth
summary_text: A suicidally disillusioned liberal politician puts a contract out on himself and takes the opportunity to be bluntly honest with his voters by affecting the rhythms and speech of hip-hop music and culture.

name: Chhapaak
summary_text: The trials and triumphs of Malti, an acid attack survivor. From the investigation of the attack to the court proceedings, the medical treatment to the emotional healing. Chhapaak is the story of the unquashable human spirit.

name: Just Cause
summary_text: A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after twenty-five years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.

name: An American Haunting
summary_text: Based on the true events of the only case in US History where a spirit caused the death of a man.

name: On the Rocks
summary_text: A young mother reconnects with her larger-than-life playboy father on an adventure through New York.

name: Gunjan Saxena: The Kargil Girl
summary_text: Inspired by the life of a fearless young officer who made history by becoming the first Indian female Air Force officer to fly in a combat zone during the 1999 Kargil War

name: The Secret Life of Bees
summary_text: In 1964, a teenage girl in search of the truth about her mother runs away to a small town in South Carolina and finds a family of independent women who can connect her to her past.

name: Death Race 2000
summary_text: In a dystopian future, a cross country automobile race requires contestants to run down innocent pedestrians to gain points that are tallied based on each kill's brutality.

name: She's Funny That Way
summary_text: On the set of a playwright's new project, a love triangle forms between his wife, her ex-lover, and the call girl-turned-actress cast in the production.

name: Recep Ivedik
summary_text: A man trying to impress his childhood lover, although it may sound romantic, it is not.

name: On Body and Soul
summary_text: When slaughterhouse workers Endre and Mária discover they share the same dreams, where they meet in a forest as deer and fall in love, they decide to make their dreams come true, but it's difficult in real life.

name: Taste of Cherry
summary_text: An Iranian man drives his truck in search of someone who will quietly bury him under a cherry tree after he commits suicide.

name: The Adventures of Pluto Nash
summary_text: In the future, a man struggles to keep his lunar nightclub out of the hands of the Mafia.

name: The Last Unicorn
summary_text: A beautiful unicorn sets out to learn if she truly is the last of her kind in this sparkling animated musical.

name: Frozen River
summary_text: A mom looks for another source of income, when her husband leaves with the money meant for the new mobile home. A nearby Indian territory stretches across the border to Canada with a drivable frozen river between. Smuggling?

name: The Bélier Family
summary_text: A girl, who lives with her deaf parents, discovers that she has the gift of singing.

name: The Quiet Earth
summary_text: A man named Zac Hobson awakens to find himself alone in the world. In a desperate attempt to search for others, he finds only two who have their own agenda.

name: From Justin to Kelly
summary_text: A waitress from Texas and a college student from Pennsylvania meet during spring break in Fort Lauderdale, Florida and come together through their shared love of singing.

name: El Dorado
summary_text: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.

name: Universal Soldier: Regeneration
summary_text: Terrorists kidnap the Russian Prime Minister's 2 kids, take Chernobyl nuclear power plant and threaten to blow up a reactor. 4 Universal Soldiers go in but are no match to a Next Gen. UniSol Luc (Jean-Claude Van Damme) goes in but faces 2 NGUs.

name: The Hunting Party
summary_text: A young journalist, a seasoned cameraman and a discredited war correspondent embark on an unauthorized mission to find the No.1 war criminal in Bosnia. However, their extremely dangerous target decides to come after them.

name: The NeverEnding Story II: The Next Chapter
summary_text: A young boy with a distant father enters a world of make-believe and magic through a portal within an antique book.

name: Escape from Planet Earth
summary_text: Astronaut Scorch Supernova finds himself caught in a trap when he responds to an SOS from a notoriously dangerous alien planet.

name: Millions
summary_text: Ethics, being human and the soul come to the fore when a 7-year old finds a bag of Pounds just days before the currency is switched to Euros and learns what we are really made of.

name: The Wall
summary_text: Two American Soldiers are trapped by a lethal sniper, with only an unsteady wall between them.

name: Fathers & Daughters
summary_text: A Pulitzer-winning writer grapples with being a widower and father after a mental breakdown, while, 27 years later, his grown daughter struggles to forge connections of her own.

name: The Ottoman Lieutenant
summary_text: This movie is a love story between an idealistic American nurse and a Turkish officer in World War I.

name: The Caine Mutiny
summary_text: When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardizes the ship, the first officer relieves him of command and faces court martial for mutiny.

name: Yellow Submarine
summary_text: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

name: Silver Bullet
summary_text: In a small town, brutal killings start to plague the close knit community. Marty Coslaw, a paraplegic boy, is convinced the murders are the doings of a werewolf.

name: The Whole Truth
summary_text: A defense attorney works to get his teenage client acquitted of murdering his wealthy father.

name: Birthday Girl
summary_text: A thirtysomething bank clerk from St Albans has his small-town life exploded by the arrival of his Russian mail-order bride.

name: Grumpier Old Men
summary_text: John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, just as its new female owner catches Max's attention.

name: Jawbreaker
summary_text: Three of the most popular girls at Reagan High accidentally kill the prom queen with a jawbreaker when a kidnapping goes horribly wrong.

name: Control
summary_text: A tale about a strange young man, Bulcsú, the fellow inspectors on his team, all without exception likable characters, a rival ticket inspection team and racing along the tracks - and a tale about love.

name: Article 15
summary_text: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

name: A Midsummer Night's Dream
summary_text: Lovers' lives are complicated by city law, feuding faerie royalty, and... love.

name: The Book of Henry
summary_text: With instructions from her genius son's carefully crafted notebook, a single mother sets out to rescue a young girl from the hands of her abusive stepfather.

name: Psycho II
summary_text: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

name: Friend Request
summary_text: When a college student unfriends a mysterious girl online, she finds herself fighting a demonic presence that wants to make her lonely by killing her closest friends.

name: Kaabil
summary_text: A blind man seeks revenge against a corrupt politician and his brother after his wife is raped and killed.

name: The Stranger
summary_text: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi.

name: The Quest
summary_text: A group of gentlemen of fortune visits a legendary "Lost City", located in Tibet. They plan to steal a priceless statue "Golden Dragon" during the martial arts tournament.

name: Domestic Disturbance
summary_text: When Danny witnesses his stepfather Rick murder a man, Danny's father Frank has to protect his son from the greatest danger.

name: Mr. Turner
summary_text: An exploration of the last quarter century of the great, if eccentric, British painter J.M.W. Turner's life.

name: The Man Who Fell to Earth
summary_text: An alien must pose as a human to save his dying planet, but a woman and greed of other men create complications.

name: My Spy
summary_text: A hardened CIA operative finds himself at the mercy of a precocious 9-year-old girl, having been sent undercover to surveil her family.

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary_text: A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.

name: Dear White People
summary_text: The lives of four black students at an Ivy League college.

name: Colors
summary_text: An experienced cop and his rookie partner patrol the streets of East Los Angeles while trying to keep the gang violence under control.

name: Celebrity
summary_text: The fortunes of a husband and wife differ drastically after they divorce.

name: Juice
summary_text: Four inner-city teenagers get caught up in the pursuit of power and happiness, which they refer to as "the juice".

name: In Cold Blood
summary_text: After a botched robbery results in the brutal murder of a rural family, two drifters elude police, in the end coming to terms with their own mortality and the repercussions of their vile atrocity.

name: Honeymoon
summary_text: A newlywed couple finds their lake-country honeymoon descend into chaos after Paul finds Bea wandering and disoriented in the middle of the night.

name: Leprechaun
summary_text: An evil, sadistic Leprechaun goes on a killing rampage in search of his beloved pot of gold.

name: You're Not You
summary_text: A drama centered on a classical pianist who has been diagnosed with ALS and the brash college student who becomes her caregiver.

name: Boss Level
summary_text: A retired Special Forces officer is trapped in a never-ending time loop on the day of his death.

name: The Man with Two Brains
summary_text: A brain surgeon marries a femme fatale, causing his life to turn upside down. Things go more awry when he falls in love with a talking brain.

name: Dreams
summary_text: A collection of tales based upon eight of director Akira Kurosawa's recurring dreams.

name: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension
summary_text: Adventurer, brain surgeon, rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his crime-fighting team, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil alien invaders from the eighth dimension who are planning to conquer Earth.

name: Sullivan's Travels
summary_text: A Hollywood director, John L Sullivan, sets out to experience life as a poor, homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.

name: Catch and Release
summary_text: A woman struggles to accept the death of her fiancé and the secrets he kept from her as she rebuilds her life.

name: The Wild
summary_text: An adolescent lion is accidentally shipped from the New York Zoo to Africa. Now running free, his zoo pals must put aside their differences to help bring him back.

name: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
summary_text: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

name: The Wolf Man
summary_text: Larry Talbot returns to his father's castle in Wales and meets a beautiful woman. One fateful night, Talbot escorts her to a local carnival where they meet a mysterious gypsy fortune teller.

name: The Asphalt Jungle
summary_text: A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.

name: Masaan
summary_text: Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.

name: Z
summary_text: The public murder of a prominent politician and doctor amid a violent demonstration is covered up by military and government officials. A tenacious magistrate is determined not to let them get away with it.

name: Shin Godzilla
summary_text: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster.

name: Kick
summary_text: An adrenaline junkie walks away from a whirlwind romance and embraces a new life as a thief, though he soon finds himself pursued by veteran police officer and engaged in a turf war with a local gangster.

name: American Dreamz
summary_text: The new season of "American Dreamz," the wildly popular television singing contest, has captured the country's attention, as the competition looks to be between a young Midwestern gal (Moore) and a showtunes-loving young man from Orange County (Golzari). Recently awakened President Staton (Quaid) even wants in on the craze, as he signs up for the potential explosive season finale.

name: Super Troopers 2
summary_text: When a border dispute arises between the U.S. and Canada, the Super Troopers are tasked with establishing a Highway Patrol station in the disputed area.

name: Three Steps Above Heaven
summary_text: A privileged woman and a reckless man fall in love despite their different social classes.

name: My Life Without Me
summary_text: A young woman conceals the fact of her terminal cancer to live her life with a passion she never had before.

name: City by the Sea
summary_text: Vincent Lamarca, whose father was executed for a 1950s kidnapping of a child, grew up to become a police officer, only to see his own son become a murder suspect.

name: Chalet Girl
summary_text: Former skateboard champion Kim wants to make more money after her mother's tragic death. She joins the elite posh servicing company, which sends her off to Austria.

name: Gorillas in the Mist
summary_text: The story of Dian Fossey, a scientist who came to Africa to study the vanishing mountain gorillas, and later fought to protect them.

name: Jean de Florette
summary_text: A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.

name: Two Mules for Sister Sara
summary_text: Nun Sara (Shirley MacLaine) is on the run in Mexico and is saved from cowboys by Hogan (Clint Eastwood), who is preparing for a future mission to capture a French fort. The pair become good friends, but Sara never does tell him the true reason behind her being outlawed.

name: Pather Panchali
summary_text: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

name: Vera Drake
summary_text: Abortionist Vera Drake finds her beliefs and practices clash with the mores of 1950s Britain--a conflict that leads to tragedy for her family.

name: Dhoom 2
summary_text: Mr A, a fearless thief, steals valuable artefacts and teams up with the girl he is attracted to but who cannot be trusted. Close on their heels are three police officers trying to apprehend them.

name: Broadway Danny Rose
summary_text: In his attempts to reconcile a lounge singer with his mistress, a hapless talent agent is mistaken as her lover by a jealous gangster.

name: 10 Years
summary_text: The night of their high school reunion, a group of friends realize they still haven't quite grown up in some ways.

name: Millennium Actress
summary_text: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

name: Before Night Falls
summary_text: The life of Cuban poet and novelist, Reinaldo Arenas.

name: Dersu Uzala
summary_text: The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.

name: Sarfarosh
summary_text: After his brother is killed and father severely injured by terrorists, a young med student quits his studies to join the Indian Police Service to wipe out the terrorists.

name: The Angels' Share
summary_text: Narrowly avoiding jail, new dad Robbie vows to turn over a new leaf. A visit to a whisky distillery inspires him and his mates to seek a way out of their hopeless lives.

name: Nashville
summary_text: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention.

name: Barney's Version
summary_text: The picaresque and touching story of the politically incorrect, fully lived life of the impulsive, irascible and fearlessly blunt Barney Panofsky.

name: Suite Française
summary_text: During the early years of Nazi occupation of France in World War II, romance blooms between Lucile Angellier (Michelle Williams), a French villager, and Lieutenant Bruno von Falk (Matthias Schoenaerts), a German soldier.

name: The Good German
summary_text: While in post-war Berlin to cover the Potsdam Conference, an American military journalist is drawn into a murder investigation which involves his former mistress and his driver.

name: Tamasha
summary_text: The life of a man with borderline personality disorder is relived in three stages: as a nine-year-old child, a 19-year-old adolescent and a 30-year-old adult.

name: The Big Heat
summary_text: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

name: The Girl Next Door
summary_text: Follows the unspeakable torture and abuses committed on a teenage girl in the care of her aunt and the boys who witness and fail to report the crime.

name: Little White Lies
summary_text: A near-fatal accident leaves one friend in the hospital while the rest go on their annual vacation. But their secrets and personal grief threaten to drive them apart.

name: Artemis Fowl
summary_text: Artemis Fowl, a young criminal prodigy, hunts down a secret society of fairies to find his missing father.

name: Amazing Grace
summary_text: The idealist William Wilberforce (Ioan Gruffudd) maneuvers his way through Parliament, endeavoring to end the British transatlantic slave trade.

name: Short Circuit 2
summary_text: Robot Johnny Five comes to the city and gets manipulated by criminals who want him for their own purposes.

name: Demain tout commence
summary_text: A bachelor enjoys his sweet life on the French Riviera until a one-night stand tells him, he's dad to Gloria and leaves her with him. He moves to London with Gloria. Mom turns up 8 years later.

name: Wrongfully Accused
summary_text: Ryan Harrison is framed for murder and must prove himself innocent by finding a mysterious one-eyed, one-armed, one-legged man after escaping from a bus accident on the way to jail.

name: Obvious Child
summary_text: A twenty-something comedienne's unplanned pregnancy forces her to confront the realities of independent womanhood for the first time.

name: Nostalgia
summary_text: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy to research the life of an 18th-century composer.

name: The Mummy
summary_text: An Egyptian mummy searches Cairo for the girl he thinks is his long-lost princess.

name: Georgia Rule
summary_text: A troubled young woman is sent to live with her grandmother for the summer, while hiding a secret that could potentially tear her family apart.

name: Hamburger Hill
summary_text: A very realistic interpretation of one of the bloodiest battles of the Vietnam War.

name: Rome, Open City
summary_text: During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.

name: The King and I
summary_text: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.

name: Zero
summary_text: The story revolves around Bauua Singh (Shah Rukh Khan), a vertically challenged man, who is full of charm and wit, with a pinch of arrogance. Born to a wealthy family and raised in an environment of affluence, he is challenged to broaden his horizon and find purpose in life.

name: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
summary_text: A family of Emigre mice decide to move out to the West, unaware that they are falling into a trap perpetrated by a smooth-talking cat.

name: The Perfect Score
summary_text: Six high school seniors decide to break into the Princeton Testing Center so they can steal the answers to their upcoming SAT tests and all get perfect scores.

name: Hindi Medium
summary_text: A couple from Chandni Chowk aspire to give their daughter the best education and thus be a part of and accepted by the elite of Delhi.

name: Private Benjamin
summary_text: A sheltered young high-society woman joins the United States Army on a whim and finds herself in a trickier situation than she ever expected.

name: Phenomena
summary_text: A young girl, with an amazing ability to communicate with insects, is transferred to an exclusive Swiss boarding school, where her unusual capability might help solve a string of murders.

name: Crazy/Beautiful
summary_text: At Pacific Palisades High, a poor Latino falls hard for a troubled girl from an affluent neighborhood.

name: Over Her Dead Body
summary_text: A ghost tries to sabotage her former boyfriend's current relationship with a psychic.

name: House on Haunted Hill
summary_text: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

name: The Brave Little Toaster
summary_text: A group of dated appliances embark on a journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in a cabin in the woods.

name: I.Q.
summary_text: A mechanic romances the mathematician niece of physicist Albert Einstein, with help from him and his friends.

name: The Croods: A New Age
summary_text: The prehistoric family the Croods are challenged by a rival family the Bettermans, who claim to be better and more evolved.

name: Dirty Work
summary_text: A loser finds success in the revenge-for-hire business.

name: Professor Marston & the Wonder Women
summary_text: The story of psychologist William Moulton Marston, and his polyamorous relationship with his wife and their mistress who would inspire his creation of the superheroine, Wonder Woman.

name: Rustom
summary_text: A naval officer returns home to find out about his wife's affair. Soon, he surrenders after murdering the lover but as the case unfolds, it starts to reveal his hidden intention.

name: The Blob
summary_text: An alien lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.

name: Fly Away Home
summary_text: A father and daughter decide to attempt to lead a flock of orphaned Canada Geese south by air.

name: All the King's Men
summary_text: Based on the Robert Penn Warren novel. The life of populist Southerner Willie Stark, a political creature loosely based on Governor Huey Long of Louisiana.

name: House
summary_text: A troubled writer moves into a haunted house after inheriting it from his aunt.

name: The Christmas Chronicles: Part Two
summary_text: Kate Pierce, now a cynical teen, is unexpectedly reunited with Santa Claus when a mysterious troublemaker threatens to cancel Christmas - forever.

name: Fading Gigolo
summary_text: Fioravante decides to become a professional Don Juan as a way of making money to help his cash-strapped friend, Murray. With Murray acting as his "manager", the duo quickly finds themselves caught up in the crosscurrents of love and money.

name: Dragon Wars: D-War
summary_text: Once in 500 years, ancient mythical creatures come to Earth, wreaking havoc and destruction. This time they must be stopped.

name: Saboteur
summary_text: A young man accused of sabotage goes on the lam to prove his innocence.

name: Repo! The Genetic Opera
summary_text: A worldwide epidemic encourages a biotech company to launch an organ-financing program similar in nature to a standard car loan. The repossession clause is a killer, however.

name: Let's Go to Prison
summary_text: When a career criminal's plan for revenge is thwarted by unlikely circumstances, he puts his intended victim's son in his place by putting him in prison...and then joining him.

name: Calibre
summary_text: A shocking deed turned their weekend trip into a nightmare. Now their only hope is to swallow their paranoia and act normal.

name: My Name Is Nobody
summary_text: A young, easy-going gunman worships and competes with an old gunfighter who only wants to retire.

name: Stakeout
summary_text: Two detectives observe an escaped convict's ex-girlfriend, but complications set in when one of them falls for her.

name: The Prodigy
summary_text: A mother concerned about her young son's disturbing behavior thinks something supernatural may be affecting him.

name: 2 States
summary_text: This movie chronicles how Chetan met his wife and the difficulties they faced due to their cultural differences.

name: My Name Is Bruce
summary_text: Mistaken for his character Ash from the 'Evil Dead' trilogy, Bruce Campbell is forced to fight a real monster in a small Oregon town.

name: The Black Hole
summary_text: A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, on the edge of a black hole.

name: The Shadow
summary_text: In 1930s New York City, The Shadow (Alec Baldwin) battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan (John Lone), who is building an atomic bomb.

name: Beaches
summary_text: A privileged rich debutante and a cynical struggling entertainer share a turbulent, but strong childhood friendship over the years.

name: Stormbreaker
summary_text: After the death of his uncle, the 14-year-old schoolboy Alex Rider is forced by the Special Operations Division of the UK's secret intelligence service, MI6, into a mission which will save millions of lives.

name: Someone Like You
summary_text: After being jilted by her boyfriend, a talk show talent scout writes a column on the relationship habits of men which gains her national fame.

name: You Can't Take It with You
summary_text: A man from a family of rich snobs becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family.

name: Gambit
summary_text: An art curator decides to seek revenge on his abusive boss by conning him into buying a fake Monet, but his plan requires the help of an eccentric and unpredictable Texas rodeo queen.

name: Kapoor & Sons
summary_text: A story revolving around a dysfunctional family of 2 brothers who visit their family and discover that their parents marriage is on the verge of collapse,the family is undergoing a financial crunch and much more as the drama unfolds.

name: Deck the Halls
summary_text: Two neighbors have it out after one of them decorates his house for the holidays so brightly that it can be seen from space.

name: The Art of the Steal
summary_text: Crunch Calhoun, a semi-reformed art thief, agrees to get his old gang back together to pull off one last heist.

name: The Great Gatsby
summary_text: A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.

name: Albert Nobbs
summary_text: Albert Nobbs struggles to survive in late 19th-century Ireland, where women aren't encouraged to be independent. Posing as a man so she can work as a butler in Dublin's most elegant hotel, Albert meets a handsome painter and looks to escape the lie she has been living.

name: Buffalo Soldiers
summary_text: A criminal subculture operates among U.S. soldiers stationed in West Germany just before the fall of the Berlin wall.

name: Bloody Sunday
summary_text: A dramatization of the Irish civil rights protest march and subsequent massacre by British troops on January 30, 1972.

name: The Bar
summary_text: In bustling downtown Madrid, a loud gunshot and two mysterious deaths trap a motley assortment of common urbanites in a decrepit central bar, while paranoia and suspicion force the terrified regulars to turn on each other.

name: Crocodile Dundee in Los Angeles
summary_text: Australian Outback adventurer Mick "Crocodile" Dundee travels to Los Angeles with his young son while his longtime companion suspects foul play at a movie studio.

name: Pirates of Silicon Valley
summary_text: History of Apple and Microsoft.

name: Devil's Pass
summary_text: A group of students go the location of the infamous Dyatlov pass incident to make a documentary, but things take a turn for the worse as the secret of what happened there is revealed.

name: The Vanishing
summary_text: The boyfriend of an abducted woman never gives up the search as the abductor looks on.

name: Addicted to Love
summary_text: Maggie's and Sam's former partners are in love; she wants revenge and he wants his lost love back, so they work together to break up the happy couple.

name: No
summary_text: An advertising executive comes up with a campaign to defeat Augusto Pinochet in Chile's 1988 referendum.

name: Nights in Rodanthe
summary_text: A doctor, who is travelling to see his estranged son, sparks with an unhappily married woman at a North Carolina inn.

name: Cooties
summary_text: A mysterious virus hits an isolated elementary school, transforming the kids into a feral swarm of mass savages. An unlikely hero must lead a motley band of teachers in the fight of their lives.

name: The Pact
summary_text: As a woman struggles to come to grips with her past in the wake of her mother's death and the disappearance of her sister, an unsettling presence emerges in her childhood home.

name: Welcome to the Rileys
summary_text: On a business trip to New Orleans, a damaged man seeks salvation by caring for a wayward young woman.

name: The Leopard
summary_text: The Prince of Salina, a noble aristocrat of impeccable integrity, tries to preserve his family and class amid the tumultuous social upheavals of 1860's Sicily.

name: Mirror Game
summary_text: Ayna is an actor and the prison is his stage. He slips into the characters of the powerful convicted in exchange of money and take their place in prison. This strange profession is borne ...                See full summary »

name: Immortal Beloved
summary_text: The life and death of the legendary Ludwig van Beethoven. Besides all the work he is known for, the composer once wrote a famous love letter to a nameless beloved, and the movie tries to ...                See full summary »

name: The Contract
summary_text: A father and his son attempt to bring in an assassin to the authorities, but his dangerous associates have other plans.

name: Rage
summary_text: When the daughter of a reformed criminal is kidnapped, he rounds up his old crew and seeks his own brand of justice.

name: Bad Santa 2
summary_text: Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve.
